mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popup_comment_tbl (user_id, popup_id, content, created_at, updated_at, rating) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{popup_id}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT pc.popup_comment_id, pc.content, pc.created_at, pc.updated_at, pc.rating, u.user_nickname, p.title AS popup_title FROM popup_comment_tbl pc JOIN user_tbl u ON pc.user_id = u.id JOIN popup_tbl p ON pc.popup_id = p.popup_id WHERE p.popup_id = #{popup_id} ORDER BY pc.created_at DESC;
